title: Special Scorpion Bowl
ingredients: ['3 cupfuls crushed ice', '4 tablespoons gin', '2 tablespoons dark rum', '4 tablespoons 151 proof rum', '4 tablespoons light rum', '4 tablespoons vodka', '4 tablespoons grenadine syrup', '225ml fresh orange juice', '285ml pineapple juice', '85ml fresh lemon juice', '4 pineapple chunks', '8 cocktail cherries']
